item.title: Glitch
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

ther3aper:

I had one of my players test it out it works without spaces but its doesnt work with spaces? why is this?

It may be because:

  1. Your Server doesn’t recognize the Space.
  2. Your Server thinks the Space is the end of the String.

Read full topic

item.title: Glitch
item.dc:creator: @eyeownyew Eyeownyew
item.description:
@eyeownyew wrote:

It’s also redundant to do

if(c.checkVotes(c.playerName))

The checkVotes method should already know what player you’re referring to since you already used the variable c

Read full topic

item.title: Glitch
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

I’m going to go ahead and edit this so people can read it:

     if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("claim")) {
          if(c.checkVotes(c.playerName)) {
               String[] args = playerCommand.split(" ",2);
                    c.getItems().addItem(995, 50000000);
     
     for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) {
          if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {
               Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j];
                    c2.sendMessage("<shad=9440238>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +" has just voted and recieved 50mil!");
                    }
               }
          } else {
               c.sendMessage("You have not voted.");
     }

On Topic: I suggest you check out the following:

     /*
      Method stored in your "Misc" class. This has to do with Optimizing Text for capitalization and such. This can interfere 
      with what you're attempting to do.
     */
     
     Misc.optimizeText 
     /*
      Method stored in your "Client" class. This has to do with fetching your Player's Username for assignment. I doubt this is the problem, but it
      can be if you don't intercept Underscores and things of that sort. 
     */
     
     c.playerName

P.S. Take your question out of your Code Tag so people can read it easily. Also, replace your Code with what I posted so It’s easier on the eyes.

[b][size=24pt]MAJOR EDIT: LOL, did I really just post that!?! What I said about Text Optimization is NOT your problem. Disregard that.[/size]

Read full topic

item.title: Glitch
item.dc:creator: @ther3aper ther3aper
item.description:
@ther3aper wrote:

[code]I am not sure if it has to do with my code or my vote4cash when a player has a name like this “cool dude” with a space in his name he wont receive the reward once he does ::claim

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase(“claim”)) {
if(c.checkVotes(c.playerName)) {
String[] args = playerCommand.split(" “,2);
c.getItems().addItem(995, 50000000);
for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) {
if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {
Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j];
c2.sendMessage(”<shad=9440238>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +" has just voted and recieved 50mil!");
}
}
} else {
c.sendMessage(“You have not voted.”);
}

Read full topic
